uk.ac.open.kmi.iserve.sal.manager

Interface iServeComponent

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DocumentManager, KnowledgeBaseManager, LogManager, NfpManager, ReviewManager, ServiceManager, SparqlGraphStoreManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConcurrentSparqlGraphStoreManager, DiscoveryEngineImpl, DocumentManagerFileSystem, IntegratedComponent, KnowledgeBaseManagerSparql, NfpManagerSparql, RegistryManagerImpl, ServiceManagerIndexRdf, ServiceManagerSparql

    public interface iServeComponent
    iServeComponent defines the basic methods that internal components from iServe should implement
    Since:
    06/09/2013
    Author:
    Carlos Pedrinaci (KMi - The Open University)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void shutdown()
      This method will be called when the server is being shutdown.

    • Method Detail

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        This method will be called when the server is being shutdown. Ensure a clean shutdown.
